Class EndpointValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.dhs.kudos.rest.v1.service.WiredService
      • gov.dhs.kudos.rest.v1.service.EndpointValidation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StatsService

    public class EndpointValidation
extends WiredService
    Service layer for handling logic for validating all v1 endpoints

    bsuneson
